description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 25th March 2024 (RN 23/01644/FULL) for the Demolition of existing extension and replacement with new extension at the lower ground floor; extension of an existing side extension at lower ground to first level; minor reconfiguration of layout at lower ground and first floor levels; and associated works. NAMELY, removal of as approved side extension on upper ground and first floor levels; alteration of as approved two bedrooms at lower ground floor to create a new bedroom suite;  lowering of section of floor by 300mm; inspection of the existing lower ground floor structure and replacement where necessary; adding damp proofing, thermal insulation and underfloor heating and adding damp proofing and thermal insulation to the lower ground floor walls (Linked to (24/05952/LBC)
